## Use the custom URLs and Sign-in page

Follow the steps below to configure custom access URLs for this platform and
the enabled products and redesign the Sign in page for your own brand:

1\. Navigate to **Customisation** > **URLs and sign-in page**.

2\. In the **Custom URLs** step, enter your domain name to the text box and
click **Verify** to validate the URLs. Note that the domain name can only
contain digits (0-9), letters (A-Z and a-z), and hyphen (-), and cannot exceed
20 characters. The URLs of the enabled products will also be populated and
verified.

3\. Click **Apply** to apply your custom URLs.

4\. After the custom URLs are applied for the products in your tenant, click
**Next** to go to the **Custom sign-in page** step.

5\. In the **Custom sign-in page** step, you can change the logo and the
background image, choose to display a custom welcome message, or decide
whether to display the footer or customise your footer content.

6\. You can have a preview on the right for your changes or choose to preview
in a web page.

7\. Click **Save** to save your changes.
